body: Since I haven't done one of these in awhile and as I've been more inactive than usual due to my current school trip, I decided to hope on the forums to answer some questions and have a couple of giggles. Shoot-away and ask me anything.
body_tagged: Since I haven't done one of these in awhile and as I've been more inactive than usual due to my current school trip, I decided to hope on the forums to answer some questions and have a couple of giggles. Shoot-away and ask me anything.
title: AMA - Juano

replies.body:
@javipepe: Me interesa el campo de la medicina pero mi futuro todavía es incierto siendo que me faltan alrededor de 4 años para terminar el colegio.
@Fuseh: Still in a school trip that has lasted about 3 weeks by now. Been visiting England, specificly, some of it's cities such as Windsor, Leeds, London, Canterbury, Cambridge, etc..
@Greg: School is the thing I mostly hate to talk about right now since my trip (Read above) has been keeping me out of it's track. I guess I'll have to recover from it once it's over.

P.S to Greg: Congrats on Senior, however I'm afraid to tell you the internet coming out from the place I've been staying at is too crappy for me to log in Teamspeak and congratulate you personally. Cheers.

replies.body: f*ck, i'm still at school. That's so annoying, i'm like 30 mins away from you. Ask if you can visit YORK. Because it is very historical and nice.

replies.body:
Although I'm leaving to Chile on Saturday, the trips have been paid already and York is not one of them.
I can't just ask my teacher to go there, I still have another 28 classmates who have an opinion, plus it's not that easy cause we're getting low on money as well.






rip

replies.body:
As for the team, you seemed to fit quite well as a leader but once the time went through, your argues with Barney made me lose a lot of respect for you as well as you made your overall image look worse than before. Besides that, I think you're really funny as a person and some people might underrate you as a pvper but I know you're better than most of the people in here.

xoxo

replies.body:
@DaFrozenBlaze: I don't consider myself any good and if I ever said so, I was probably kidding.
As for the earthquake, I'm currently enjoying my 3 week school trip throughout England so I wasn't in Chile by the time the earthquake started.

@Grqphix; Naga 2014. Bought a bright new one since the other one's lens stopped working about a month ago.
